name: domain_seo_analysis
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool domain_seo_analysis.
Tool description: Bishopi's advanced and real-time proprietary SEO metrics for domain names investors, keywords research and SEO professionals. - More on Bishopi.io 
API description: Fetch popular SEO metrics for a specified domain name, optionally considering the search from a specific country's perspective.

domain.description: The domain name to analyze for SEO metrics.

country.description: Specify the proxy location for the search. Supported countries include 'US', 'CA', 'IE', 'GB', 'FR', 'DE', 'SE', 'IN', 'JP', 'KR', 'SG', 'AU', 'BR'. Defaults to 'us'.
